title: Inline Skates Rental in Amsterdam
caption: Right next to the beautiful Vondelpark, and if you want to skate outside of the park, then the bike lanes are smooth and without hills!

title: Coqtales Show: The Hottest Male Show in Amsterdam, Magic Mike
caption: Book ahead and bag your ticket to Coqtales in Amsterdam, the new male strip show in town.

title: 1-Hour Archery Class in Amsterdam
caption: Enjoy a 60 minutes session of Archery at our Outdoor location in Amsterdam West.

title: Electric Scooter Private Tour Amsterdam
caption: Let's go Dutch. Only your guide, who is a local, knows if, when, when, why, what etc :-) This is so much fun !

title: Bubble Football in Amsterdam
caption: You can play Bubble Football with a group of 4 or more players.

title: House of Rituals
caption: In 2020, one of Europe's most popular Home & Body Cosmetics brands, Rituals, opened its first flagship store in the historic centre of Amsterdam.

title: Amsterdam: Luxury Boat Tour with Onboard Bar
caption: Enjoy watching the city float by in a relaxing setting (drinks are available for purchase) as you listen to guided commentary.

title: House of Bols Amsterdam Entrance Ticket Plus Cocktail
caption: You can learn all about it and sample some of the juniper-flavored liquor at the House of Bols Cocktail & Genever Experience

title: Ultimate Party Pub Crawl
caption: Enjoy crazy nights with the best house music in a multinational enviroment
